content: this knitting pattern creates a classic and versatile hat featuring a 1x1 ribbed design the hat is knitted in the round from the brim to the crown making it seamless and comfortable to wear the 1x1 ribbing consisting of alternating knit and purl stitches adds elasticity and texture to the fabric ensuring a snug and cozy fit clear easy-to-follow instructions this pattern is suitable for knitters of all levels from beginners to experienced makers
